name: Curse of the Dice (ScarletParadox)
description:
[This game was made for the GMTK  2022 game jam]

Descend deep into a cursed dungeon, where your life's very fate is decided by the roll of a dice.

This game can be played with mouse only. Any info regarding dice or enemy specifics can be found in the bottom left manual.

Credits:

This game is developed by Scarlet Paradox

https://www.scarletparadox.com/

Art, programming, design, and testing done by Charlie Bragg

All sound effects come from Creative Common 0 license sounds from Freesound.com

music is "Veloren - Cavernous Hollow" by GeekyGami on newgrounds

https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1142612

As always, thank you for playing! Rate if you enjoyed!
